inventory_categories.name: House Keeping Supplies
inventory_categories.description: This category includes all essential supplies for maintaining room cleanliness and guest comfort. It covers cleaning agents, detergents, disinfectants, sponges, and various cloths. Additionally, it contains guest-facing amenities such as soaps, shampoos, lotions, and other toiletries required to ensure a pleasant and hygienic stay for all guests. Proper stock management here is crucial for daily operations.

inventory_categories.name: Food & Beverage Stock
inventory_categories.description: Encompasses all perishable and non-perishable items for the hotel's restaurants, bars, and room service. This includes fresh produce, meats, dairy products, dry goods, canned foods, beverages, spirits, wines, and coffee. Maintaining optimal stock levels in this category is vital for menu availability, controlling costs, and ensuring a high-quality dining experience for patrons across all outlets.

inventory_categories.name: Maintenance & Engineering Parts
inventory_categories.description: A comprehensive collection of spare parts and tools necessary for the upkeep of the hotel's infrastructure. This category features light bulbs, plumbing fixtures, electrical components, HVAC filters, paint, and various hardware. Effective management ensures that the maintenance team can perform timely repairs and preventative maintenance, guaranteeing the safety and operational readiness of the entire property.

inventory_categories.name: Linens & Uniforms
inventory_categories.description: Contains all textile assets required for hotel operations. This includes high-quality bed sheets, pillowcases, towels, bathrobes, and tablecloths for guest rooms and dining areas. It also covers the complete range of staff uniforms for different departments, such as front office, housekeeping, and food service. Inventory tracking is key to managing laundry cycles and replacement schedules.

inventory_categories.name: Events & Activities Equipment
inventory_categories.description: This category holds all equipment needed for hosting meetings, conferences, weddings, and recreational activities. It includes audio-visual systems like projectors and microphones, portable stages, special lighting, and decorative items. For leisure, it might also contain sports equipment or pool accessories. This inventory supports the hotel's event services and enhances the overall guest experience.

inventory_categories.name: Front Office Supplies
inventory_categories.description: Comprises all materials required for the smooth operation of the front desk and concierge services. Key items include stationery, pens, registration cards, key cards, printers, and toners. These supplies are fundamental for guest check-in, check-out, and administrative tasks. Maintaining a well-stocked front office is essential for efficiency and presenting a professional image to guests upon arrival.

inventory_items.description: Energy-efficient light bulbs for room lamps.

inventory_items.name: Front Desk Pens
